overview:
Trade Consulting Services is a full service compliance firm specializing in helping companies understand and implement the requirements of the import and export regulations. With more than 14 years of experience, we have assisted clients navigate through the regulations and helped them avoid fines and penalties by establishing sound compliance programs.

Some of the services offered by Trade Consulting Services includes: • Commodity Jurisdiction determination; • CCATS / Commodity Classification Request with the Department of Commerce; • Assistance with export classification (USML, ECCN, USHTS, and Schedule B); • Drafting licenses and agreements for both the Department of Commerce and State; • Providing customized training; • Interpretation of the regulations; • Identifying areas for improvement in policies and procedures; • Audit of historical transactions or licenses and agreements; and • Assisting with voluntary disclosures.
